> " I sure know that one Wheels. Primus knows we've all=

Lord Elder frowned as they spoke of Rodimus in deroga=

ecial.
He must prove himself, not only in battle but also in wisdom, and be=

able to rally the Maximals and Autobots." Elder glanced pointedly at

n, "and he must learn to see past what he thinks is the obvious

E=
lder turned back to his controls as he linked up with the ark's

o!" he said as he watched one of his smaller screens in

st hint of curiousness. "We are holding no
